subject: New file uploaded to EVP-ITC
author: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
full_text:
Hello,

This email message is a notification to let you know that
a file has been uploaded to the Files area of the EVP-ITC 
group.

  File        : /Jim's RR-DR60 EVP's/Brandon_Dillard_Brandon_Hyslope-BOOSTED -AUDIO-evp.wav 
  Uploaded by : clockdryve <clockdryve@...> 
  Description : At a location on 5-25-10 I call 2 churches....on a hill with 2 churches about 300ft both sodes of me. One is old and shut down. The location is new to me with 3 recording sessions now. This day was a VERY good day with many EVP's on both DR60 and the B7 recorders. I increased the amplification in the area of the EVP's voice to help hear it otherwise MOST would not be able to find it. I found out today after just listening again that a little girl also says "okay" just before the main evp speaks. 

You can access this file at the URL:
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/EVP-ITC/files/Jim%27s%20RR-DR60%20EVP%27s/Brandon_Dillard_Brandon_Hyslope-BOOSTED%20-AUDIO-evp.wav 

To learn more about file sharing for your group, please visit:
http://help.yahoo.com/l/us/yahoo/groups/original/members/forms/general.htmlfiles

Regards,

clockdryve <clockdryve@...>
